front.title: IEEE Guide for the Definition of Reliability Program Plans for Nuclear Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Guidelines for the definition of a reliability program at nuclear generating stations andother nuclear facilities are provided. The document emphasizes reliability programs during theoperating phase of such stations; however, the general approach applies to all phases of thenuclear power generating station life cycle (e.g., design, construction, start-up, operating, anddecommissioning).
